vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἐγκᾰκέω,
behave remissly in a thing, ἐνεκάκησαν τὸ πέμπειν they culpably omitted to send, [LXX+2nd c.BC+]: with participle, τὸ καλὸν ποιοῦντες μὴ ἐγκακῶμεν [NT+3rd c.AD+]; compare ἐκκακέω.
__II ἐγκακοῦμεν· ὑψοῦμεν, [Refs 5th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to lose heart, become discouraged
Used in place of ἐκκακέω (G1573) in numerous verses.
vocabInfos._es_Definition: desanimarse; estar cansado de; cansarse de
